text: A ɲaxanla Sɛrɛsi nun a lanfane yi a fala Haman xa, e naxa, “Muxu singandena nde rafala naxan nɔngɔnna yɛ tonge suulun liyɛ. Nayi, tila xɔtɔnni i yi a fala mangan xa, a a xa Marodoke singan mɛnni, a xa faxa, alogo i sɛwaxin xa siga mangan matideni donse dondeni.” Awa, na falan yi Haman kɛnɛn, a muxu singanden nafala.
